snippet.title: MindsEye - Official Gameplay Trailer | 2025
snippet.description:
All footage captured in-game.
Fight your fate. MindsEye. From Game Director, Leslie Benzies. Coming Summer 2025.  

Play as Jacob Diaz, an elite former soldier fitted with the MindsEye, a mysterious neural implant that haunts him with fragmented memories of a covert mission that changed his life forever. Fight to uncover the truth in a world where AI, high-tech experimentation, and unchecked military power shape every encounter.

Dropped during PlayStation State of Play, MindsEye premiered a cinematic story trailer and a gameplay showcase, giving players a first look at its near-future setting, explosive combat, and adrenaline-fueled driving sequences.

Wishlist now: www.mindseye.game
